content: The Reprocessed ViewFlex Xtra Intracardiac Echocardiography (ICE) Catheter is intended for use in adolescent and adult patients for visualization of cardiac structures and blood flow within the heart. The device features a 64-element phased array transducer and 4-way steerability, controlled through its handle with two deflection mechanisms that align with the movement of the distal shaft in four planes. This version of the catheter is identical to the OEM version provided by Abbott Laboratories, but has undergone sterilization and processing by Sterlimed before reuse
